title: Did ‘The Simpsons’ Predict That President Trump Would Touch a Glowing Orb?
subtitle: Memes represented that the animated series showed Trump touching a glowing orb fifteen years before the actual incident took place.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: "The Simpsons" depicted that President Donald Trump would touch a glowing orb fifteen years before he actually did so during a trip to the Middle East.
